definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Add the left brace that marks the beginning of the function body.
sentences.chinese: 添加标记函数体开头的左大括号。

sentences.english: In this case, curly brackets indicate a list of values.
sentences.chinese: 在本例中，大括号表示值列表。

sentences.english: Within the braces, you can include any formula.
sentences.chinese: 在大括号内，可以包含任何公式。

sentences.english: In QML, a user interface is specified as a tree of objects with properties.
sentences.chinese: 在大括号之间，我们能指定对象的信息，如它的属性。

sentences.english: You can omit the braces if the method body has just one expression.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在方法主体只有一个表达式的时候省略大括号。

sentences.english: The declaration block is surrounded by curly braces and made up of declarations.
sentences.chinese: 声明块放在大括号中，由声明组成。

sentences.english: Everything inside of the curly braces is the code I am writing.
sentences.chinese: 所有在大括号里面的代码都由我们自己编写。

sentences.english: Always place an open curly brace ({) in a new line.
sentences.chinese: 左大括号总是放在新行中。

sentences.english: In this case, the braces will remain highlighted until the cursor is moved.
sentences.chinese: 在此例中，大括号会保持反白显示直到移动游标为止。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
